noun.description: A separate section of a structure or container in which certain items can be kept separate from others.
examples: there's some ice cream in the freezer compartment

noun.description: A grassy mound or other support depicted below a shield.

verb.description: Divide (something) into separate parts or sections.
examples: the buildings are to be compartmented by fire walls

origin: Mid 16th century: from French compartiment, from Italian compartimento, from compartire, from late Latin compartiri divide.
